InstalledItem.Name: Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Crusader Industries
Size: 3

This pilot-controlled, dual-linked nose turret is mounted to the belly of the Mercury Star Runner. Bespoke to the ship, the turret is outfitted with two size-3 laser repeaters ready to help keep your flight path clear.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: SureGrip S2 Tractor Beam
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Tractor Beam
Max Angle: 60°
Max Range: 150 m
Full Strength Distance: 75 m

Backed by their certified Soft-Touch® guarantee, Greycat’s SureGrip tractor beam, is a mainstay of its product catalogue thanks to its dependable range and control.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-423 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 2xS3

Behring’s MSD-423 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile

Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: FullStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: UltraFlux
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Initially designed under a military contract, A&R's UltraFlux medium power plant decimated the required performance milestones and enjoyed a storied career as a dependable military asset. When the military’s exclusive rights to this high quality component lapsed, A&R eagerly released this to the commercial market.

InstalledItem.Name: Boreal
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Military

Designed to disperse the heat of battle, Aegis Dynamics’ Boreal cooler is a military standard with the capacity to survive stressful situations.

InstalledItem.Name: Yeager
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Whether you’re rushing to the rescue or simply patrolling through a sector, the Yeager quantum drive from Wei-Tek allows for greater performance when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
